state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to open the dresser. And then, pick up the cake scented passkey from the dresser within the sauna. And then, go to the west. That done, make it so that the cake scented hatch is unlocked. And then, make it so that the cake scented hatch in the garage is open. And then, go to the north. And then, pick-up the passkey from the floor of the parlor. Then, make it so that the gate is unlocked. And then, ensure that the gate is open. After that, make an effort to go to the north. Then, attempt to head east. Following that, make an effort to take a trip east. That done, make an attempt to travel east. After that, recover the cloak from the floor of the closet. That's it! -= Sauna =- You find yourself in a sauna. An usual kind of place. You make out a closed dresser. You make out a bench. The bench appears to be empty. There is an open door leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the north. > -= Sauna =-0/1
